extension_info_request_extension_descrip: If you request an extension, you'll be given an extra 14 days to provide your identity verification details
extension_info_submit_request_descriptio: You must submit your request before the current verification deadline has passed.
extension_info_role_description_1: The extension will only apply to their role as a PSC of
extension_info_role_description_2: , not to any other PSC or company director roles you hold.
